mapper.select: select qb.id, qb.type, qb.content, qb.choice, qb.answer, qb.pic_url as picUrl, qb.model_id as modelId, qb.category_id as categoryId, sa.answer as studentAnswer, qba.score as totalScore, sa.score from student_answer sa inner join question_back qb on qb.id = sa.question_id inner join question_back_assignment qba on qba.question_id = sa.question_id and qba.assignment_id = sa.assignment_id where sa.user_id = #{userId} and sa.assignment_id = #{assignmentId}::uuid

select sa.id, sa.question_id as questionId, sa.assignment_id as assignmentId, sa.user_id as userId, sa.answer, sa.score, sa.created_at as createdAt, sa.updated_at as updatedAt from student_answer sa inner join assignment a on a.id = sa.assignment_id::uuid inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id where ccs.course_id =#{courseId}

select sa.id, sa.question_id as questionId, sa.assignment_id as assignmentId, sa.user_id as userId, sa.answer, sa.score, sa.created_at as createdAt, sa.updated_at as updatedAt from student_answer sa inner join assignment a on a.id = sa.assignment_id::uuid inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id where ccs.chapter_id =#{chapterId}

select sa.id, sa.question_id as questionId, sa.assignment_id as assignmentId, sa.user_id as userId, sa.answer, sa.score, sa.created_at as createdAt, sa.updated_at as updatedAt from student_answer sa inner join assignment a on a.id = sa.assignment_id::uuid where a.section_id =#{sectionId}

select ci.status = 0 from student_answer sa inner join assignment a on a.id = sa.assignment_id ::uuid inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id::uuid inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id where sa.id =#{id}::uuid;
mapper.update: update student_answer set answer = #{answer}, score = #{score} where id=#{id}::uuid;
mapper.insert:
insert into student_answer (question_id, assignment_id, user_id, answer, score) values
( #{item.questionId}::uuid, #{item.assignmentId}::uuid, #{item.userId}, #{item.answer}, #{item.score} )
mapper.delete: delete from student_answer where assignment_id = #{assignmentId}::uuid and user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select distinct qb.type from question_back_assignment qba inner join question_back qb on qb.id = qba.question_id where qba.assignment_id =#{assignmentId} ::uuid
